entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JsonElement deserialization dispose behavior #87751
  • [API Proposal]: Recover JsonNode from string path #87749
  • [API Proposal]: LoggerMessage - support ILogger property in addition to fields #87747
    Future
  • Service Collection does not allow Type Generic Classes with fewer open Generic Types to be used, even if all Types missing Open Generic Types are provided as Compile Constants #87746
  • [mono][ios] Library tests failing on device with IL stripping enabled during AOT compilation #87740
    Future
  • .net8 prev 5 unassociated AOT processes crash when the debugger starts on the system. #87739
    8.0.0

Closed

  • how dotnet find windows kits paths #87743
  • [ARM64] `Vector128<T>.ExtractMostSignificantBits()` + `TrailingZeroCount` has better alternative than MoveMask emulation #87735
  • Add additional LoggerMessageAttribute constructors #87254
    8.0.0
  • Failed to read environment variable [DOTNET_STARTUP_HOOKS], HRESULT: 0x800700CB #87687
  • Fix AddMetrics extension method namespace #86885
    8.0.0
  • Unable to disable SIMD in WASM project #87741

PullRequests

Created

  • Matrix4x4.CreateViewport #87748
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Cache significant segments computations for layouts in physical promotion #87745
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add BinaryData.ContentType #87744
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Claims identity and principal debugging update #87742
    area-System.Security

Merged

  • Add LoggerMessageAttribute constructor's overloads #87738
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0
  • Fix the namespace of IServiceCollection.AddMetrics #87736
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 8.0.0

Updated

  • [TEST] http metrics sandbox #87697
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Options validation source generator #87587
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • Optimize scalar conversions with AVX512 #84384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Fix muxer handling of symlinks on Windows #87717
    area-Host
  • LSRA-throughput: Iterate over the regMaskTP instead all registers #87424
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Share UTF8 converters between coreclr and mono #85558
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [nativeaot][tests] Add smoke unit runtime tests for Native AOT on iOS platforms #87260
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Import isinst/castclass Nullable as underlying type #87241
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Don't emit nor generate the manifest for NativeRuntimeEventSource #86850
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • [mono][ios] Add support for stripping during AOT compilation on iOS #87728
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Fix budgets for dynamic heap count and add smoothing to overhead computation #87618
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Email addresses in same domain not equal #87721
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
